other_tests.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears coarsened. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The common hepatic duct measures 5 mm. The gallbladder has several stones and layering sludge in a minimally distended gallbladder. There is a small amount of pericholecystic fluid without significant wall edema. The pancreas is not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas.
